attributes.action: negotiate with Wiley to renounce his retirement from MCing in the grime scene
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we demand that the Prime Minister does everything within his power to ensure Wiley does not turn his back on the grime scene. The Godfather of Grime should not be allowed to retire.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
